LuaModule.Name: note
LuaModule.Initializer:
{ 
				Text = "Hymm of Huthaukar:
Praise be to Glory
Praise be to Piety
Praise Be to Bravery
He who does not kill
Will be nothing still!
All in time for night
All in time for blight
Chaos Come, Chaos Come
Take us in the night!
Desolation, Desolation
Show us the morning night!
Star Dweller, Star Dweller
Take us to the sky
That we might find you so high
Old Ones, Elder Gods
Bring us the gift of blight
For remember the prophecy, of Huthaukar the Right:

 When the Last Tree is Cut
And the Last river Poisoned
And the last Fish is Caught
And the last rain Dropped
Then will we find the blessings we saught
And then the Star Dweller will return his flock."
				}
